We are committed to protecting your privacy. The information we provide in this policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
1. **Information Collection**: We may collect certain personal information such as name, email address, and location. 2. **Information Use**: We use this information to improve the service and provide the best user experience. 3. **Information Protection**: We take all necessary measures to protect your data. 4. **Information Sharing**: We do not share your information with third parties.
For more details, please read our Terms and Conditions.
